title: 为什么指令都用不了
author: orz_wtt
txt_content: 和同学开了个服务器 为什么所有指令都用不了 输入指令就是下面2个 要怎么办呀.

replies.author: orz_wtt
replies.txt_content:
图上 Unknown command. Type "help"...

I'm sorry but you do not have permission to perform this conmmand. please contact the server administrators if you believe that is in error
